law.catch_line: Effect of conversion of corporation to limited liability company.

text.section: A limited liability company that has been converted pursuant to this chapter shall be for all purposes the same entity that existed before the conversion.

law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 29, sec. 18, effective June 8, 2011. -- Repealed and reenacted 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 51, sec. 17, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 17, effective June 26, 2007.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/2010). 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 51, sec. 183, provides, "The specific textual provisions of Sections 1 to 178 of this Act which reflect amendments made to those sections by 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 137 shall be deemed effective as of June 26, 2007, and those provisions are hereby made expressly retroactive to that date, with the remainder of the text of those sections being unaffected by the provisions of this section."
